about.title: About Us
about.description: Markus Co is a family company from Valjevo, founded in 1994, with a clear mission to provide consumers with quality and affordable personal hygiene products. With modern equipment and a dedicated team, we develop our own brands and successfully collaborate with domestic and foreign partners, building trust through quality, responsibility and innovation.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Our line of wet wipes is designed to meet the most diverse needs - from gentle baby care, through universal cleaning, to specialized disinfection solutions. Quality, practicality and reliability in every package.

productDescriptions.universal: Wet wipes for the whole family

modalContent.babyFit: Baby Fit wet wipes keep your baby's skin soft and fresh. They gently clean and care for every diaper change. Soft and full, alcohol-free, pH neutral and enriched with vitamin E. Perfect for gentle cleaning of baby's skin without water. The whole family can use them.
modalContent.perfecto: Perfecto Fit Universal wet wipes remove dirt from all smooth surfaces (furniture and laminated surfaces, tiles and laminates, ceramics, wall tiles, plastic), while Perfecto Fit Wood Surface are used to remove dirt from wooden furniture and wood-like materials with oil for their care, giving them shine.
modalContent.universal: Universal Fit and Family Fit wet wipes in family packaging are designed for hand and face hygiene. Soft, refreshing, pH neutral and non-allergenic. Ideal for cleaning without water.
modalContent.disinfect: Disinfect Fit Antibacterial wet wipes are designed for disinfection of skin and objects. For external use only. Pocket packaging allows you to carry them everywhere with you.
modalContent.wet: Wet wet wipes without alcohol are specially designed to clean, care for and refresh the skin. Pocket packaging allows you to carry them everywhere with you. Ideal for the whole family.
modalContent.eko: They gently clean baby's skin in a natural way. They contain biodegradable fabric and ingredients from renewable sources. Soft and full, alcohol-free, maintain natural skin pH and are non-allergenic. The whole family can use them.

services.title: Contract Manufacturing
services.description: We specialize in private label wet wipes production, collaborating with leading retail chains and partners throughout the country and region. We provide complete and reliable service - from formula development to delivery of finished product - while respecting the highest quality standards and flexibility tailored to your needs.

descriptions.quality: More than two decades of experience and dedication to quality confirm our place in the market.
descriptions.innovation: Our products are created under controlled conditions, respecting the highest quality and safety standards.
descriptions.sustainability: Our philosophy is based on listening to your needs and continuously improving our products and services.
